title: Bicomponent core/sheath melt-blown fibers for air filtration with ultra-low resistance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14100-14113
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02174F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiaofang Lin, Wenbo Sun, Minggang Lin, Ting Chen, Kangming Duan, Huiting Lin, Chuyang Zhang, Huan Qi
A one-step melt-blown spinning process has been proposed for the production of bicomponent core/sheath (BCS) crimped fibers, which can be applied to high-efficiency, low-resistance air filtration.
